









-- Store Value from switch and put it on HEX Display


00000010011000000000000000000000  -- store 0 in reg 3
00000010100000000000000000000111  -- store 0b00111 in reg 4
00000011101000010000000000010000  -- store 0x10010 in rb0X
00000011110000010000000000100000  -- store 0x10020 in rb1X
00001111111000000000000000000000  -- move switch to Reg 0
01100010000010000100000000000000  -- Reg0 AND reg 4 -> Reg 2 
00001100010111100000000000000000  -- move Reg2 to Hex display
01101010011000000000000000000000  -- Jump to Value in Reg 3
01111010000000010010000000000000  -- HALT





-- some other tests


--00000010000000000000000000000101  -- StoreA in Reg 0
--00001010000000100000000000000000  -- Move Reg 0 to Reg 1



--0000011101000010000000000010000  -- trigger HEX Display  -> save 0x10010 in rb0X
--00000101111000000000000000001010  -- Store a 10 in Memory


--00000010000000000000000000000101  -- StoreA in Reg 0
--00000010001000000000000000001010  -- StoreA in Reg 1
--00011010000000100100000000000000  -- Add Reg 0 und Reg1 und Store in Reg 2
--00000010011000000000000000001010  -- StoreA in Reg 3
--00000010100000000000000000000100  -- StoreA in Reg 4
--00111010011010001010000000000000  -- Mult Reg3 und Reg 4 und Store in Reg 5
--00000001111000000000000000001110  -- StoreA in Memory (spX)
--00000001111000000000000000001111  -- StoreA in Memory (spX)
--00001010000111000000000000000000  -- Move spX in rb1X
--00001111111000000000000000000000  -- Move Memory (spX pos) to Reg 0 




--01101010011000000000000000000000  -- Jump to Value in Reg 3
--01111010000000010010000000000000  -- HALT


--00000011101000010000000000000000  -- Store LED Adress IN rb0x
--00000010000000000000000000000001  -- Store 1 in Reg 0
--00000010001000000000000000000000  -- Store 0 in Reg 1
--00001100000111100000000000000000  -- Move Reg 0 to LED
--01101010001000000000000000000000  -- Jump to Value in Reg0
